org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.storage
Interface StorageProvisioningDriver

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseStorageDriver, EbsStorageDriver, OpenstackStorageDriver
public interface StorageProvisioningDriver

This interface provides an entry point to provision block storage devices and attach them to specific compute instances nodes created by the BaseComputeDriver . This is still a work in progress. so there may be changes to the method signatures in the near future. Also, snapshot functionality will be provided.

Since:
2.5.0
Author:
elip, adaml

Method Detail

setConfig

void setConfig(Cloud cloud,
               String computeTemplateName)
Called once at initialization. Sets configuration members for later use. use this method to extract all necessary information needed for future provisioning calls.

Parameters:
cloud - - The Cloud Object.
computeTemplateName - - the compute template name used to provision the machine that this volume is dedicated to.

createVolume

VolumeDetails createVolume(String templateName,
                           String location,
                           long duration,
                           TimeUnit timeUnit)
                           throws TimeoutException,
                                  StorageProvisioningException
Creates a new storage volume with respect to location and storage template parameters. StorageTemplate

Parameters:
templateName - The name of the template to be used when starting a new volume.
location - The location where the storage volume will be created.
duration - Duration until times out.
timeUnit - The duration timeout units.
Returns:
volume details object
Throws:
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
StorageProvisioningException - On storage creation error. any started volumes will be removed.

attachVolume

void attachVolume(String volumeId,
                  String device,
                  String ip,
                  long duration,
                  TimeUnit timeUnit)
                  throws TimeoutException,
                         StorageProvisioningException
Attaches a specific storage volume to a machine instance according to its IP address.

Parameters:
volumeId - The ID of the volume that will attach instance.
device - The device name of the storage volume.
ip - The designated machine instance IP for attaching the volume.
duration - Duration until times out.
timeUnit - The duration timeout units.
Throws:
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
StorageProvisioningException - If volume is already attached, volume and machine not in same location etc.

detachVolume

void detachVolume(String volumeId,
                  String ip,
                  long duration,
                  TimeUnit timeUnit)
                  throws TimeoutException,
                         StorageProvisioningException
Detaches a specific storage volume from machine instance according to its IP address.

Parameters:
volumeId - The ID of the volume that will be detached.
ip - The designated machine instance IP to detach from.
duration - Duration until times out.
timeUnit - The duration timeout units.
Throws:
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
StorageProvisioningException - If detaching fails.

deleteVolume

void deleteVolume(String location,
                  String volumeId,
                  long duration,
                  TimeUnit timeUnit)
                  throws TimeoutException,
                         StorageProvisioningException
Deletes a storage volume according to its volume ID and storage device location.

Parameters:
location - The location of the volume that will be deleted.
volumeId - The ID of the volume that will be deleted.
duration - Duration until times out.
timeUnit - The duration timeout units.
Throws:
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
StorageProvisioningException - If deletion of volume fails.

listVolumes

Set<VolumeDetails> listVolumes(String ip,
                               long duration,
                               TimeUnit timeUnit)
                               throws TimeoutException,
                                      StorageProvisioningException
Lists all storage volumes attached to a machine instance according to its IP address.

Parameters:
ip - The machine instance IP.
duration - Duration until times out.
timeUnit - The duration timeout units.
Returns:
a set of VolumeDetails containing details about the machine volumes.
Throws:
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
StorageProvisioningException - If list fails.

getVolumeName

String getVolumeName(String volumeId)
                     throws StorageProvisioningException
Returns the volume name according to its ID.

Parameters:
volumeId - The ID of the volume that will be detached.
Returns:
The volume name according to volumeId.
Throws:
StorageProvisioningException - If fails retrieving volume name.

setComputeContext

void setComputeContext(Object context)
                       throws StorageProvisioningException
Sets the jClouds compute context if exists.

Parameters:
context - jClouds compute context
Throws:
StorageProvisioningException - In-case context does not match the specified storage driver.

close

void close()
Close all resources.
